segments.text: I really need to lose some weight . I should go on a diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you should work out more too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! You are much skinnier since the last time I saw you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have lost about five kilos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was on a diet and exercised daily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can try a low-impact workout schedule . Why don't you go to a gym ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . Then the trainer will help me to make a fitness plan . Besides that , what's your secret ?
segments.speaker: S1
